categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Towe was a Zabrak male Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire residing on Tatooine until 3643 BBY, when he was killed.

Towe appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Tatooine. He is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means he was killed.
Sith Lord Towe is a NPC Boss that was created and named after a make-a-wish recipient who visited BioWare during the creation of Star Wars: The Old Republic.[source?]
